Note: Use QC3.0 car charger larger than 18W.. it built-in latest smart chips, make the charging more assured, intelligent, and safe.【360° Versatile View&One Hand Operation】Our wireless car charger rotates using a high-quality ball joint that can rotate 360 degrees and provide the most comfortable, optimized view angle. position your phone at the perfect angle to enjoy a more relaxed and safe drive. the base of the mount remains fixed into the air vent of your car, it won't move no matter how much swiveling or rotation you do.【Lifetime Warranty 】Any problem with the product, please contact us. we will provide you with a lifetime warranty and exchange the new products for free. our mag-safe wireless car charger mount has passed, fcc, and RoHS certifications and it adopts the latest standards and the latest smart chips. the wireless car charger can provide over-current, over-heating, over-voltage, and short-circuit protection to ensure charging safety.
